column5: I guess the UFC doesnt even want to look like they have a performance enhansing drug screening program. Watching it live on Fox and Rashad Evens major suppier on his trunks is a company called Muscle Pharmancy!! Too funny!
If Muscle Pharm is the brand you speak of, they make a wide variety of supplements, not steroids
Google, it's amazing at the things you'll find!  Muscle Pharm has nothing to do with steroids.
